review.author: Architect
review.findings: Health strip label fix. health-strip.js:7 now imports SHORT_AGENT_NAMES from config. Line 104 changed from .substring(0,4) truncation to SHORT_AGENT_NAMES[paneId] fallback chain. Verified: SHORT_AGENT_NAMES exported from config.js (line 120), present in mock-config helper (line 35). Test mock at health-strip.test.js:13 matches config.js values exactly (Arch, DevOps, Ana). Label assertions updated: line 199 'Arch', line 200 'DevOps', line 201 'Ana'. No other consumers of the changed code path. Clean routine fix â€” no cross-model review needed.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
